New York University Archives
Beverly (Beldner) Kaplan Papers
Wachtel, Cheryl
Kaplan, Beverly
MC.321
0.25 Linear Feet in 1 half manuscript box and 1 folder in shared housing
1944-1948 Beverly Kaplan graduated in 1948 from the New York University School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance. The Beverly (Beldner) Kaplan Papers consist of materials created and collected while Kaplan was a student at the School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance from 1944 to 1948. The collection includes photographs of Kaplan with her fellow classmates, a diploma, report cards, an engraved fountain pen and mechanical pencil with her name, a class yearbook, and a New York University alumna card. Materials are in English. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.
Scope and Contents
The Beverly (Beldner) Kaplan Papers consist of materials created and collected while Kaplan was a student at the New York University School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance from 1944 to 1948. The collection includes photographs of Kaplan with her fellow classmates, a diploma, report cards, an engraved fountain pen and mechanical pencil with her name, a class yearbook, and a New York University alumna card.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Biographical Note
Beverly Kaplan graduated in 1948 from New York University the School of Commerce, Accounts and Finance. Kaplan passed away in February 2017.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. You are free to use materials in the collection in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Cheryl Wachtel in July 2017. The accession number associated with this gift is 2019.048.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Beverly (Beldner) Kaplan Papers; MC 321; box number; folder number or item identifier; New York University Archives, New York University.
Processing Information
At the time of accessioning, materials were placed in new acid-free folders and boxes, and described on the collection-level.
